params.812: Reach level 10 in the Magic skill.
params.813: Ensure you have runes for a spell you can cast at your Magic level. Cows and Farmers around Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.
params.814: Ensure you have a spell set that you can use and have the runes for.|Take some food to keep your hitpoints high.|Cows and Farmers around Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.|Cows drop hides that can be turned into leather for Crafting xp.
params.823: Use obstacles when using Magic combat to avoid taking damage.
